scripts.postinstall: cd packages/database && turbo run prisma:generate && mkdir -p ../../node_modules/.pnpm/@prisma+client@5.22.0_prisma@5.22.0/@prisma/client && cp ../../node_modules/.pnpm/@prisma+client@5.22.0_prisma@5.22.0/node_modules/.prisma/client/libquery_engine-rhel-openssl-3.0.x.so.node ../../node_modules/.pnpm/@prisma+client@5.22.0_prisma@5.22.0/@prisma/client/
